title: Voice-Controlled AR Hand Assistant
description: Built an AR assistant for Meta Quest 3 using Unity and the Meta XR Platform SDK. Enabled gesture-based interactions and contextual command execution. Integrated GPT-4o with custom prompts and YOLOv11-based object detection to assist daily tasks. Created spatial reasoning modules and hybrid vision-language models with Moondream, YOLOWorld, and CLIP.

title: Golang Microservices for Enterprise Collaboration
description: Designed a microservices system with API Gateway, JWT-based authentication, and gRPC for internal communication. Built services in Go with PostgreSQL and MongoDB, supporting note lifecycle, content enhancement, and asynchronous RabbitMQ messaging. Deployed via Docker on Kubernetes.

title: LLMAE – LLM Prompt Attack Evaluation
description: Developed an automated evaluation platform to red-team large language models by generating diverse prompt mutations. Built Python pipelines for semantic, syntactic, and cipher-based transformations. Deployed a Django-MySQL backend via Docker and Nginx with RESTful APIs and Swagger docs.

title: RefineText AI – Mobile App
description: Designed and developed a React Native app with Firebase backend to support tone and grammar refinement for job communication. Integrated OpenAI API and secure Stripe payment via Firebase Cloud Functions. Enabled swipeable UI, auth, and billing state management.
